item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Erling Devold â€” a machine learning researcher and engineer passionate about building intelligent systems that learn from limited supervision.

Currently, I lead the development of a weakly supervised learning approach for analyzing sonar data. I’m particularly interested in combining representation learning, marine imaging, and creative AI, including music + ML crossover work.

I believe in open science, reproducible ML workflows, and exploring the frontier between the natural and computational world.
